To plan a surprise birthday party and send out personalized invitations with short, unique URLs, follow these steps:

1. Sign up for a Bitly account or log in to your existing account.
2. For each invitation URL, paste it into the Bitly URL shortener.
3. Customize the short link by adding a title and choosing a custom Bitly domain if desired.
4. Click the "Shorten" button to generate a short URL for each invitation.
5. Repeat these steps for each invitation URL.

To get started with Bitly's custom domain feature, follow these additional steps:

1. In the Bitly dashboard, go to the "Settings" tab.
2. Click on "Branded Short Domain."
3. Purchase a custom domain or use an existing domain that you own.
4. Verify your domain.

Using Bitly's custom domain feature, you can create professional and memorable short URLs for your personalized birthday party invitations. Bitly offers various features, including custom domains, link branding, and detailed analytics.

answer.final_answer:
To promote your charity event on social media and generate short URLs for the event details, follow these steps:

1. Sign up for a Bitly account and obtain an API key.
2. Use the following Python code to generate short URLs for each event detail URL:

```python
import requests

# Replace YOUR_API_KEY with your actual Bitly API key
api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY"

# Replace LONG_URL with the long URL for your event detail
long_url = "LONG_URL"

response = requests.post(
    "https://api-ssl.bitly.com/v4/shorten",
    data={"long_url": long_url, "access_token": api_key, "format": "json"},
    headers={"Content-Type": "application/json"}
)

short_url = response.json()["result"]["short_url"]
print(short_url)
```

Replace YOUR_API_KEY with your actual Bitly API key and LONG_URL with the long URL for your event detail. Repeat this process for each event detail URL to generate a short URL.

3. To create branded short links for your event website, set up a custom branding domain in your Bitly account:

   a. Log in to your Bitly account.
   b. Click on your profile picture at the top right corner and select "Settings."
   c. Go to the "Branding" tab and click on "Add a Branded Domain."
   d. Enter the desired custom domain name (e.g., event.mybrand.com) and click "Save."
   e. Verify the domain by following the instructions provided by Bitly.

4. Use your custom branding domain when generating short URLs with the Bitly API. The short URLs generated will use your custom domain instead of the default Bitly one.

By following these steps, you will be able to generate short URLs for your event details using the Bitly API and create branded short links for your event website using a custom branding domain.

To enhance your online presence as a small business owner, you can make use of the URL Link Shortener tool and the Bitly tool. Here's how:\
1. Visit the URL Link Shortener tool (such as bit.ly or goo.gl) to create short links for your website or any other online content. The tool offers various domains for users to choose from, including some branded options that may be more suitable for businesses. While the tool does not provide a list of available domains specifically for small businesses, you can browse the available domains to find one that fits your brand or image. Some examples of available domains include bit.ly, j.mp, t.co, goo.gl, and ow.ly. If you need more information or help using the tool, feel free to ask.\
2. Use the Bitly tool to create short and catchy URLs for your website or specific pages. To do this, sign up for a free account on the Bitly website, copy the URL of the page you want to shorten, paste it into the Bitly text box, click "Shorten," customize the short link with a label or custom bit if desired, and then click "Save and Finish." Your short URL is now ready to use and can be shared on social media, emails, or any other platform where a long URL might be unwieldy. Remember to use descriptive labels or custom bits to make your links more catchy and memorable for your audience.

To share your latest blog post on social media and create both short URLs using the Bitly tool and branded short links for your website, follow these steps:

1. Creating Short URLs for your latest blog post using Bitly:
   a. Go to the Bitly website (<https://bitly.com/>).
   b. Sign in or create an account.
   c. Paste the URL of your latest blog post into the "Long URL" field on the Bitly homepage.
   d. Customize your short URL (optional) in the "Customize" field.
   e. Click the "Shorten" button to generate the short URL.
   f. Copy the short URL by clicking the "Copy" button or right-clicking and selecting "Copy link address."
   g. Share the short URL on social media or any other platform.

   a. Choose a reliable URL shortener tool that supports branded links, such as Bitly, TinyURL, or your own company's branded link shortener.

   c. Log in to your account and go to the dashboard.
   d. Look for the option to create a new short link.
   e. Enter the URL of the page on your website that you want to create a short link for.
   f. Choose a custom short link that includes your brand name. For example, mybrand.co/short-link.
   g. Click the "Create" or "Shorten" button to generate the short link.
   h. Copy the short link and use it to share the link on social media or in emails.

By following these steps, you'll be able to create and share short URLs for your latest blog post and branded short links for your website, making your links more memorable, professional, and recognizable to your audience while also gaining insights into their behavior.

To plan a surprise anniversary party and send out digital invitations with short, unique URLs, follow these steps:

1. Use a URL shortener tool like Bitly to generate short URLs for each digital invitation. To do this, sign up for a free Bitly account, paste the URL of your digital invitation into the "Long URL" field, click "Shorten," and copy the generated shortened URL. Repeat this process for each digital invitation.

2. If you'd like to choose a custom domain for your short links, check with the specific URL shortener service you intend to use to see if they offer a list of available domains or custom domains. Some popular URL shortener services, like Bitly, offer customizable domains, so you can create short links with a personalized domain name.

3. Here are some suggestions for customizable domain names for your anniversary party invitations using Bitly:
   - bit.ly/anniversaryinvite
   - bit.ly/couplenameanniversary
   - bit.ly/partylocationanniversary
   - bit.ly/anniversaryRSVP

Choose a name that is meaningful, easy to remember, and reflects the essence of your anniversary party.

Using a URL shortener tool like Bitly makes it easier to share long links on social media or in text messages without taking up too much space. Plus, with Bitly, you can track the number of clicks on each link.

I hope this information helps you plan a successful surprise anniversary party with digital invitations and short, unique URLs. Happy planning!

As a marketing manager, to track the performance of your social media campaigns and create branded short links for your website, follow these steps:

1. Use the URL Link Shortener tool to set up a custom branded short domain for your links. This will allow you to create personalized short links that represent your brand or business. The process involves signing up for a short link service that supports custom branded domains, purchasing a domain name, configuring it in the short link service's dashboard, creating a CNAME record, verifying the CNAME record, and mapping your custom domain to your short link service's API.
2. Use the same URL Link Shortener tool or a different one like Bitly, TinyURL, or Short.io to create branded short links for your website. Sign up for an account, log in, navigate to the dashboard or settings section, enter your preferred brand name or domain for the custom short links, save the branding settings, and generate short links for each webpage.
3. To create unique short URLs for each social media campaign post using Bitly, go to the Bitly website, sign up for a free account, paste the long URL of each campaign post into the text box at the top of the dashboard, click the "Shorten" button to generate a short URL, and customize it with your branded link if possible. Save or record the short URLs for future reference.

By following these steps, you'll be able to create custom branded short links for your social media campaigns and website that are memorable, professional, and easily recognizable for your audience.

answer.final_answer:
To use the URL Link Shortener tool with Bitly for your project, follow these steps:

1. Sign up or log in to your Bitly account:
   a. Go to the Bitly website (<https://bitly.com>) and click "Sign up for free" if you don't have an account, or click "Log in" if you do.
   b. Fill in the required information, such as your email address, create a password, and add a display name and link a social media account for easier sign-in.
   c. Click the "Create my free Bitly account" button to create a new account, or enter your email address and password if you already have an account and click "Log in".

2. Access your Bitly dashboard:
   a. Go to the Bitly website at <https://accounts.bitly.com/>.
   b. If you have an existing account, click "Log In" at the top right corner and enter your email address and password.
   c. If you don't have an account yet, click "Sign Up" instead of "Log In" and fill in the required information.

3. Find the list of available domains for creating short URLs:
   The URL Link Shortener tool supports the following domains for creating shortened URLs:
   a. bit.ly
   b. t.co
   c. goo.gl
   d. tinyurl.com
   e. ow.ly
   f. buff.ly
   g. x.co
   h. j.mp
   i. cl.ly
   j. lnk.dj

4. Generate short URLs for your project using Bitly:
   a. Go to Bitly's website (<https://bitly.com>) and sign in to your account.
   b. Paste the long URL you want to shorten into the box on the homepage and click "Shorten" or press Enter.
   c. A new short URL will be generated, which you can use immediately. You can also customize the short URL by clicking on the "With Bitly" text under the shortened URL and editing the title if desired.
   d. If you plan to use Bitly frequently, consider using their API or Chrome extension to shorten URLs more efficiently.

Let me know if you have any other questions or need further clarification!

To track the engagement of your social media posts and create short URLs using the Bitly tool, follow these steps:

1. Sign up for a Bitly account and grant access to your social media platforms.
2. Use Bitly's features, such as the Chrome extension, mobile apps, or web interface, to generate short links for your social media post links when you're about to share them. You can also manually add existing post links to your Bitly account and create short links for them.
3. Save and manage all your post short links for easy tracking of engagement by signing up for a Bitly account, installing the Chrome extension, and using the Bitly web interface or API to create and manage your short links.
4. Organize your links by using folders to categorize and keep them organized.
5. Use Bitly's real-time statistics to track engagement and view historical data.
6. To create branded short links for your website, obtain an API key from a URL link shortener service and use it to create branded short links with your brand name. Make sure to use your branded domain for the links for better recognition and click-through rates.

By following these steps, you will be able to effectively track the engagement of your social media posts and website using short URLs with your brand name.

answer.final_answer:
To assist you in your documentary project about climate change, I have identified several related videos on YouTube. These videos cover various aspects of climate change, including causes, effects, and potential solutions. I have provided some details about each video, such as title, uploader, upload date, duration, and number of views. You can search for these videos on YouTube using the search engine and watch them to expand your knowledge on the topic.

If you wish to download or stream these videos using the YTStream - Download YouTube Videos tool, follow these steps:

1. First, ensure you have downloaded and installed the YTStream tool from a trusted source.
2. Search for the videos on YouTube and copy their URLs.
3. Open a terminal or command prompt and navigate to the directory where YTStream is installed.
4. Type the command `yt-dlp <paste_video_URL_here>` for each video URL, replacing `<paste_video_URL_here>` with the actual URL.
5. Press enter after each command to start the download process for each video.
6. Once downloaded, you can use the YTStream tool to stream the videos if needed. To do this, open the application, locate the downloaded files, drag and drop them into the window, and click the "Stream" button at the bottom to generate a stream link.

Remember to always check the legality and copyright of downloading and sharing videos before doing so. Happy learning and good luck with your documentary project!

To create a surprise birthday slideshow for your sister using YouTube, follow these steps:

1. Search for videos in the 'Family' category on YouTube by typing "Family Birthday Compilation" or similar keywords in the search bar and press Enter. Watch the video previews to ensure they have the right content for your slideshow. Once you've found the desired videos, click the "Save" button under each video to add it to a secret playlist named "Sister's Birthday Surprise."
2. Download the videos using a third-party tool like 4K Video Downloader. Install the software, open it, and copy the URL of the video you'd like to download. Paste the URL into the download box, select the desired video quality and format, and click the download button. Repeat this process for all the saved videos.
3. Edit the video clips together using a video editing software to create the perfect birthday slideshow for your sister.

If you'd like to use the 4K Video Downloader tool with the playlist URL, use the following command line equivalent:

```
4kvideoDOWNLOADER.exe --add-playlist-from-url <YouTube Playlist URL>
```

Replace `<YouTube Playlist URL>` with the actual playlist URL you want to download.

To document your road trip with popular travel videos, follow these steps:

1. Search for popular travel videos on YouTube using the search function of the YouTube app or website. Type in keywords like "popular travel videos" or "most viewed travel videos" to find a list of videos that interest you.
2. Copy the URL of the selected travel video from YouTube. To do this, click on the video to play it, look for the address bar at the top of your web browser, position your cursor at the beginning of the URL, and press "Ctrl+C" (or "Command+C" on a Mac) to copy it to your clipboard.
3. Navigate to the "YTStream - Download YouTube Videos" tool by visiting their website (<https://yt-dl.org/webui/>) and downloading the installer or AppImage for your operating system.
4. Paste the copied URL into the input field of the YTStream tool, click the "Download" button to start the download, choose the desired video or audio format and quality, and download the file again.
5. Once the video is downloaded, use a media player application to stream and watch the video on your road trip. Some popular media player apps include VLC Media Player, KMPlayer, and Windows Media Player (for Windows users). Make sure the video format is supported by the media player app you choose before your trip.

If you have any further questions or need additional assistance, please let me know. Enjoy your road trip and happy travels!

answer.final_answer:
To find music videos for inspiration for your next music production project, you can search for them in the 'Music' category on YouTube using the YouTube Data API. Here's how:

1. Use the search query "music videos" with the YouTube Data API and specify the `part=snippet` parameter to get the video title and `type=video` parameter to filter the results to videos only.
2. Authenticate your requests with a Google Cloud Platform account and obtain an API key.
3. Use the Google APIs Explorer tool or python-youtube library to make your requests.

Once you have identified the music videos you want to download, you can use the YTStream - Download YouTube Videos tool to download these videos. Here's how:

1. Open YouTube and search for the music videos you want to download.
2. Copy the video URLs.
3. Open YTStream - Download YouTube Videos tool.
4. Paste the copied YouTube URL into the input field.
5. Choose the video quality and format.
6. Click on the "Download" button.
7. Wait for the download to finish. The downloaded file will be saved to your default download location.

To stream the downloaded videos for viewing, you can follow these general steps:

1. Locate the downloaded video file on your device.
2. Choose a media player that can handle the video format.
3. Open the media player and navigate to the location of the downloaded video file.
4. Once you have selected the file, click the "Play" button to start streaming the video for viewing.

Keep in mind that downloading videos from YouTube without permission may infringe on copyright laws, and using third-party tools like YTStream may have legal and security implications. Always ensure that you have the legal right to download and use the content.

Based on your interest in watching a nature documentary, I have two suggestions. A popular nature documentary currently available for streaming in the US is "Planet Earth II" by BBC. This documentary series showcases the diverse wildlife and habitats around the world in stunning detail and has received critical acclaim for its cinematography and production quality. You can stream it on popular platforms such as Netflix or Amazon Prime Video.

Additionally, if you're specifically looking for the original "Planet Earth" documentary, I have good news for you. This documentary is also available for streaming in the US on popular platforms such as Netflix and Amazon Prime Video. So, you have the option to choose between "Planet Earth II" and the original "Planet Earth" series. Enjoy your viewing experience!

Based on the information provided, here are five popular classic movies that are currently available for streaming in the US, along with their streaming sources:

1. Casablanca (1942): This timeless romantic drama can be streamed on HBO Max, Tubi, and Paramount+.
2. Gone with the Wind (1939): This epic romantic tale is available on Tubi, Hulu, and FX+.
3. The Godfather (1972): This crime drama can be watched on Netflix, Paramount+, and Hulu.
4. To Kill a Mockingbird (1962): This classic coming-of-age legal drama can be watched on Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, and Paramount+.
5. Citizen Kane (1941): This groundbreaking film can be streamed on Criterion Channel, Hulu, and Tubi.

I hope this information helps you plan a fantastic movie-themed party for your friends! Enjoy your classic movie marathon on these streaming platforms.

To plan your travel vlog with stunning videos, follow these steps:

1. Search for travel videos on YouTube using specific keywords:
   a. Use the YouTube Data API to search for videos based on your keywords by making a query using the "search:list" endpoint with the suitable parameters.
   b. Once you have the video IDs from the search results, use the "videos:list" endpoint with the video IDs to get more details about the videos, such as the title, description, and thumbnail URL.
   c. For instance, here's a Python example using Google Client Library:

```python
from googleapiclient.discovery import build

# Set up the API client
youtube = build('youtube', 'v3')

# Set your keywords and other search parameters
search_query = 'travel Italy'
part = 'snippet'
max_results = 10

# Make the search request
response = youtube.search().list(
    q=search_query,
    part=part,
    maxResults=max_results
).execute()

# Print the search results
for search_result in response.get('items', []):
    print(f'Title: {search_result.get("snippet").get("title")}')
    print(f'ID: {search_result.get("id").get("videoId")}')
```

2. Use a YouTube downloader tool to download the selected travel videos:
   a. Download and install 4K Video Downloader (https://www.4kdownload.com/products/product-videodownloader).
   b. Launch the software and paste the YouTube video link into the program.
   c. Choose the desired video quality and format and click "Download."
   d. The software will save the travel video to the specified location on your computer.

Keep in mind that downloading copyrighted content without the proper permissions may be against the law in some jurisdictions. Always ensure you have the rights to download and use the content.

To share a news article with your colleagues and create a short URL, follow these steps:

1. Go to Google's URL Shortener at g.co/shorturl.
2. Enter the long URL of the news article in the text box.
3. Click the "Shorten URL" button.
4. The short URL will be displayed below the text box. You can now use this short URL to share the news article with your colleagues.

To find catchy slashtags related to the news content, you can use social media or trending topic tools such as Twitter's Trends section or RiteTag. Enter keywords or phrases related to your news content in the search bar, and the tool will provide you with a list of popular and relevant hashtags. Make sure to review the list and select hashtags that accurately and effectively summarize the content of your news article. Additionally, you can check out Twitter lists or communities related to your news topic for specific and relevant hashtags. Once you have identified some catchy and relevant slashtags, include them in your social media posts or promotional materials to help increase engagement and reach with your audience.

As for the list of available domains for the short URL, Google's URL Shortener does not allow you to choose a custom domain. Instead, it generates a short URL with a goo.gl domain by default. Other URL shortening tools like Bitly and TinyURL offer custom domains as a premium feature. If having a custom domain for your short URL is important to you, consider upgrading to a paid plan with one of these services.

answer.final_answer:
To plan a surprise baby shower for your best friend and create a short URL for the baby shower invitation, follow these steps:

1. Generate a short URL for the baby shower invitation using a URL shortening tool like bit.ly, tinyurl, or goo.gl. Here's a simple guide using bitly:
   - Go to the Bitly website (<https://bitly.com/>)
   - Sign up for a free account if you don't already have one.
   - Once you're logged in, paste the long URL for the baby shower invitation into the text box labeled "Long URL".
   - Click the "Shorten" button to generate a short URL.
   - The short URL will be displayed for you. You can now share this URL with your guests.

2. Brainstorm some adorable and creative hashtags for the baby shower event using a hashtag generator tool. Here are some suggestions:
   - #BabyShowerBliss
   - #BabyShowerBlessings
   - #LittleBundleOfJoy
   - #BabyShowerBabySteps
   - #BabyShowerLoveFest
   - #BabyShowerSplendor
   - #BabyShowerSweetStart
   - #BabyShowerCelebration
   - #BabyShowerDelight
   - #BabyShowerSurprise

3. If you would like to generate a custom domain for your short URL using a domain name generator tool like LeanDomainSearch or Nameboy, follow these steps:
   - Go to the LeanDomainSearch website (<https://www.leandomainsearch.com/>) or Nameboy website (<https://nameboy.com/>).
   - Enter the keywords that best describe your short URL in the search bar.
   - Click the "Search" button to generate a list of available domains based on your keywords.
   - Review the list of available domains and select the one that best fits your needs.
   - Register the domain name through a domain registrar like GoDaddy or Namecheap.
   - Once you have registered the domain name, you can set it up as a custom domain for your URL shortening tool.

I hope this information helps you plan a successful surprise baby shower for your best friend. Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with.

2. Use Google Scholar or an online research database to search for academic articles or interviews with renowned artists. You can download the relevant PDF files for offline reading by following the instructions provided in the answer.

3. Search for websites or channels that feature contemporary art and showcase artwork by renowned artists using a search engine like Google or Bing. Bookmark or save the URLs for easy access. Some suggested websites include Artnet, Saatchi Art, Tate, MoMA, Artsy, BBC Arts, and The Guardian Art and Design.

4. To download a specific video about a famous painting, make sure it's legally available, and use a tool like YouTube-DL. Install the software, navigate to the video's URL, and use the command provided in the answer to download the video. Remember to respect copyright laws and only download content for which you have permission.

5. Use a media player like VLC or QuickTime to stream and watch the downloaded video. Enjoy your research project!

I hope this information helps you in your quest for interesting artist interviews, academic articles, and contemporary art showcases. If you have any questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to ask.

answer.final_answer:
Based on the information obtained from various sources, I can recommend the following animated movies that are suitable for both kids and adults. I have included their IMDb ratings and streaming links on Netflix and Prime Video.

1. "Coco" (2017) - IMDb rating: 8.4/10 (Netflix and Prime Video)
   This beautifully animated movie from Pixar tells the story of a young boy named Miguel who dreams of becoming a musician. It's a heartwarming and emotional journey that explores the importance of family and following your dreams.

2. "The Mitchells vs. the Machines" (2021) - IMDb rating: 7.0/10 (Netflix)
   This hilarious animated adventure follows a dysfunctional family who must team up to save the world from an army of robots. With a great voice cast and plenty of laughs, it's a must-watch for both kids and adults.

3. "My Neighbor Totoro" (1988) - IMDb rating: 8.1/10 (Netflix)
   This classic anime film from Studio Ghibli tells the story of two sisters who move to the countryside and befriend some magical creatures called Totoros. It's a beautiful and whimsical tale that's sure to delight kids and adults alike.

4. "The Lion King" (1994) - IMDb rating: 8.5/10 (Netflix and Prime Video)
   A timeless animated classic, "The Lion King" follows the journey of Simba, a young lion who must take his rightful place as king after his father's death. With memorable characters and iconic songs, it's a must-watch for generations.

5. "Spirited Away" (2001) - IMDb rating: 8.5/10 (Prime Video)
   Another Studio Ghibli classic, "Spirited Away" tells the story of a young girl named Chihiro who is transported to a magical world of spirits and must find a way to return home. It's a visually stunning and captivating adventure.

Unfortunately, I couldn't find a definitive list of adult-friendly animated movies with their IMDb ratings and streaming links on Prime Video using the API tool at the moment. However, I can suggest checking IMDb or Prime Video's websites for more information.

I hope this list of recommended animated movies meets your requirements and answers your question. Let me know if you have any further queries!

answer.final_answer: For movie trivia facts, you can listen to podcasts such as "The Weekly Planet" which has episodes dedicated to providing movie trivia and facts. For specific movie trivia, you may want to try a more specific search query like "movie title trivia" or "movie title facts." If you're looking for popular movies from the 1990s that are currently available for streaming, you can check Netflix and Amazon Prime Video. On Netflix, you may need to use their search bar or browse their "Movies & TV" section to find what they have to offer. On Prime Video, you can manually filter and sort the available movies by release year and popularity to find popular movies from the 90s. However, the API response may not contain exhaustive information about all movies available on Prime Video, so you may need to use other sources to confirm availability and watch the desired content.

answer.final_answer: Leonardo DiCaprio, born on November 11, 1974, is a renowned actor known for his roles in various films. Some of his most notable works include "This Boy's Life" (1993), "What's Eating Gilbert Grape" (1993), "Titanic" (1997), "The Revenant" (2015), "Inception" (2010), and "The Wolf of Wall Street" (2013). "The Wolf of Wall Street" is available on several streaming platforms, such as Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, Google Play Movies & TV, and iTunes. As for the latest arrivals on US streaming platforms, some recent additions include "The Old Guard" on Netflix, "Ramy" Season 2 on Hulu, "The Boys" Season 2 on Amazon Prime Video, and "Soul" on Disney+.

To share an interesting article with your friends on social media and shorten the long URL 'https://example.com/article/12345' using the Bitly API, follow these steps:

1. Create an account on the Bitly website (if you don't already have one).
2. Log in to your account and navigate to the "Settings" tab.
3. Select "API Credentials" from the dropdown menu.
4. Generate a new access token or use an existing one.
5. Incorporate the access token into your API request using a library like `bitly` in Python:

```python
import bitly

client = bitly.Bitly(api_key='YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN_HERE')
url = 'https://example.com/article/12345'
short_url = client.shorten(url)
print(short_url.url)
```

Replace `'YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN_HERE'` with your actual access token. Once you have obtained the shortened URL using the Bitly API, you can use it as the destination for creating a new link using a different URL link shortener API if desired.

answer.final_answer:
To create custom short links for your company's new product pages and gather data on click-through rates of different URL shorteners, follow these steps:

1. Research and purchase a branded domain name from marketplaces like Branded.me or Rebrandly, or register a new domain name using domain registration services like GoDaddy or Namecheap. You can then use the URL shortening services provided by these platforms to create branded short links for your product pages.
2. Use URL shortening tools like Bitly or TinyURL to generate custom short links for your product pages. Simply copy the product page URL, paste it into the URL shortener interface, and customize the link as needed.
3. Set up tracking for your URL shorteners in Google Analytics. Append campaign parameters to the end of your URL shortener links, such as `utm_source`, `utm_medium`, and `utm_campaign`.
4. Create a custom report in Google Analytics to view the click-through rates and other metrics for each URL shortener. This will allow you to compare the performance of different URL shorteners and make informed decisions about which one to use for your product pages.
5. Continuously monitor and optimize your URL shortening strategy based on the data gathered from Google Analytics.

I hope this information helps you effectively create custom short links for your product pages and gather valuable data on click-through rates for different URL shorteners. Let me know if you have any further questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with.

answer.final_answer:
To create a playlist of your favorite music videos from YouTube, follow these steps:

1. Create a new playlist named "Favorite Music Videos". To do this, sign in to your YouTube account, go to the "Library" tab, click on "Playlists", and then click on the "New Playlist" button. Name the playlist "Favorite Music Videos" and click "Create".

2. Use YouTube's search function to find and add your favorite music videos to the playlist. For example, search for a music video or artist, go to the video page, and click "Add to" followed by "Favorite Music Videos".

3. To enhance your playlist, explore related tags for the 'Music' category on YouTube. Go to the YouTube Music page, click on the "Explore" tab, search for "Music Tags", and browse through the various tags to find ones that resonate with your music preferences. Click on a tag to view the tag page and discover new music videos and playlists that fit the genre.

4. Add relevant tags to your playlist to make it more discoverable and easier to find for others. Log in to your music streaming service account (such as Spotify or Apple Music), navigate to your playlist, click on the "Edit" or "Three dots" button, and select "Edit Tags" or "Add Tags". Type in relevant keywords or phrases that describe the genre, mood, or theme of the playlist, separate each tag with a comma, and click "Save" to apply the tags to your playlist.

Now, you have a new playlist filled with your favorite music videos and can easily discover new content related to your music preferences. Happy listening!

answer.final_answer:
To download a YouTube video for your presentation and obtain its title, length, description, and related tags, follow these steps:

1. Search for the YouTube video using its title or keywords by making a request to the YouTube Data API v3 with the required "query" parameter. For example: `https://www.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/search?part=snippet&q=Star+Wars+trailer&key=YOUR_API_KEY`. Replace "Star Wars trailer" with the title or keywords for the YouTube video you want to search for and "YOUR_API_KEY" with your actual API key.

2. Once you have the video ID, make a request to the YouTube Data API to get the video's details, including its title, description, and length: `https://www.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/videos?id=VIDEO_ID&part=snippet&key=YOUR_API_KEY`. Replace "VIDEO_ID" with the unique ID of the YouTube video you want to access the description for, and "YOUR_API_KEY" with your actual API key.

3. To download the YouTube video, use a third-party YouTube video downloader tool such as 4K Video Downloader, SaveFrom.net, or KeepVid. These tools will allow you to download the video file and save it to your device. Be aware that downloading YouTube videos without the permission of the video owner may be against YouTube's terms of service and copyright law.

4. To extract the video title from the downloaded file, you can try looking for it in the file name, or use a media player or specialized tool to extract the metadata from the file.

5. To determine the length of the video, check its metadata or properties using media players or file explorers.

6. To find related tags for the 'Education' category on YouTube, search for videos using the YouTube Data API and look for the following tags: "Learning", "Online courses", "Tutorial", "University", "Student", "School", "Educational", "Academic", "Lesson", "Homework help", "Study", and "Test prep". These tags can help users find content related to various educational topics and learning resources on YouTube.

The API response includes essential details such as the video ID, title, description, and thumbnail URL. You can use this information to display the videos to your conference attendees and provide them with a clear understanding of what each video is about.

Each video also comes with the duration, which can help attendees plan their time during the conference.

The API response includes entities extracted from the video, and among these entities are likely to be people. Each person entity comes with essential information such as the person's name, occupation, and a description, which can add context and value to your virtual conference.

Regarding downloading or streaming videos using a specific tool, VLC media player can be used to play various multimedia files, but it's not primarily used for downloading or streaming videos. However, with the help of plugins like "VLCMediaPlayer-YouTube" or "vlc-dl," VLC media player can play streaming media from the internet, including YouTube videos. But it's important to remember that using these plugins to download or stream copyrighted content without permission is not legal and may violate the terms of service of the content provider. I recommend respecting copyright laws and using legitimate sources for video content.

answer.final_answer:
I'm glad you're interested in exploring the world of filmmaking! I have identified several YouTube channels that focus on different filmmaking categories and provide valuable information for filmmakers and film enthusiasts. Here are some channels and what they offer:

1. Film Riot: This channel focuses on teaching filmmaking techniques and production, featuring interviews with filmmakers and industry professionals.
2. Indy Mogul: Indy Mogul offers practical advice and tips for independent filmmakers, covering various aspects of filmmaking and featuring interviews with industry professionals and case studies of successful films.
3. No Film School: No Film School provides tutorials and resources for filmmakers and videographers, covering topics like camera techniques, lighting, sound, and post-production, and featuring interviews with industry professionals and critiques of student films.
4. The Film Theorists: This channel explores theoretical aspects of films and filmmaking, analyzing movies and genres from a symbolic and thematic perspective, featuring interviews with filmmakers and industry professionals.
5. Maker's Academy: Maker's Academy offers comprehensive courses on filmmaking and other creative skills, featuring interviews with industry professionals and offering feedback on student projects.

Regarding your question about downloading or streaming these videos, YouTube is a free platform where you can watch videos online. However, YouTube does not allow users to directly download videos without the content creator's permission. Instead, consider using YouTube Premium or other similar services that offer downloads for a subscription fee, making it a convenient option for offline viewing.

I hope you find these channels useful in your filmmaking journey! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Based on the user's question, I have identified a family-friendly TV show with a high IMDb rating called "Doctor Who." This long-running British series has an impressive IMDb rating of 8.8 out of 10 and is suitable for families who enjoy science fiction and adventure. I have also checked the streaming availability of "Doctor Who" on Netflix, Disney+, and Apple TV. The show is currently available for streaming on all three platforms, providing multiple options for families to enjoy.

Regarding the cast and crew of "Doctor Who," I have gathered the following information from the IMDb database. For the main cast, twelve actors have portrayed the Doctor, starting from William Hartnell in 1963 and most recently Jodie Whittaker in 2017. The executive producers of the show include several notable figures, including Sydney Newman, Verity Lambert, Gerry Davis, Barry Letts, Philip Hinchcliffe, Graham Williams, John Nathan-Turner, Andrew Cartmel, Philip Segal, Russell T Davies, Julie Gardner, Steven Moffat, and Chris Chibnall. Russell T Davies and Steven Moffat have played significant roles in reviving the series and contributing to its success.

Here is a brief summary of their contributions: Russell T Davies was responsible for reviving "Doctor Who" in 2005 and brought it back to television for a new generation of fans, introducing the Ninth, Tenth, and Eleventh Doctors. Steven Moffat joined as a writer and later became the executive producer, contributing several acclaimed episodes and introducing the Twelfth and Thirteenth Doctors. Chris Chibnall, the first woman to hold the position, took over as executive producer in 2018 and oversaw the Thirteenth Doctor's first three seasons. These individuals have played crucial roles behind the scenes, ensuring the show's continued success and longevity.

In conclusion, "Doctor Who" is a family-friendly TV show with a high IMDb rating, currently available for streaming on Netflix, Disney+, and Apple TV, offering multiple options for families to enjoy. The show features a rich history, with several notable actors and executive producers contributing to its success over the years.

answer.final_answer:
I'm glad you're organizing a movie night for your company employees! Based on your requirement for a popular movie that caters to different tastes, I recommend "The Shawshank Redemption" (1994). This film is a classic, widely acclaimed drama with elements of crime and adventure, making it a versatile choice for diverse audiences. It is a captivating story of hope, friendship, and redemption.

Regarding the streaming availability, "The Shawshank Redemption" is available for streaming on both Netflix and Amazon Prime Video. If you're a Netflix subscriber, you can watch the movie at your convenience. For those with Amazon Prime, the film is also accessible through your account.

As for the cast and crew, "The Shawshank Redemption" was directed by Frank Darabont. The movie stars Tim Robbins as Andy Dufresne and Morgan Freeman as Ellis Boyd "Red" Redding. The rest of the main cast includes Bob Gunton as Norton Norris, Clancy Brown as Brooks Hatlen, William Sadler as Bogs Diamond, and James Whitmore as Brooks.

Tim Robbins portrays the role of Andy Dufresne, a wrongfully imprisoned banker who befriends Morgan Freeman's character, Ellis Boyd "Red" Redding. Bob Gunton plays the corrupt warden, Norton Norris, while Clancy Brown portrays Brooks Hatlen, a long-term inmate. William Sadler plays Bogs Diamond, a violent inmate, and James Whitmore plays Red's friend, Brooks.

I hope this information helps you plan a successful movie night for your employees! If you have any further questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to ask.

8. City of Angels (1998): Directed by Brad Silberling, starring Nicolas Cage and Meg Ryan. Currently not available for streaming on Netflix or Hulu, but can be rented or purchased on Prime Video.

Based on the API response, there are several popular comedy movies currently available for streaming in the US with the following information:

1. "The Forty-Year-Old Version" (Netflix): A comedy-drama film about a down-on-her-luck playwright who decides to reclaim her mojo by rapping. The runtime is 1 hour 49 minutes, but unfortunately, the IMDb rating is not available in the API response.
2. "Soul" (Disney+): An animated comedy-drama about a music teacher who gets the chance to become a soul and learn what it means to have a soul. The runtime is 1 hour 48 minutes, and the IMDb rating is 7.9/10.
3. "Palm Springs" (Hulu): A romantic comedy about two strangers who find themselves stuck in a time loop at a wedding. The runtime is 1 hour 28 minutes, and the IMDb rating is 7.4/10.
4. "The Lovebirds" (Netflix): A romantic comedy-action film about a couple who gets embroiled in a murder mystery. The runtime is 1 hour 43 minutes, and the IMDb rating is 6.2/10.
5. "The Trial of the Chicago 7" (Netflix): A historical comedy-drama about the infamous trial of seven defendants charged with conspiracy and rioting during the 1968 Democratic National Convention. The runtime is 2 hours 6 minutes, and the IMDb rating is 7.9/10.

Additionally, if you're interested, here are the IMDb ratings for some other popular movies currently available on streaming platforms in the US:

1. "Gisaengchung" (Parasite) - IMDb rating: 8.5/10
2. "Joker" - IMDb rating: 8.3/10
3. "Avengers: Endgame" - IMDb rating: 8.4/10
4. "1917" - IMDb rating: 8.3/10
5. "Klaus" - IMDb rating: 8.1/10
6. "Ford v Ferrari" - IMDb rating: 8.1/10

These ratings range from 6.2 to 8.5 out of 10. I hope this information helps answer your question and provides you with some good comedy movies to choose from for your movie night! Let me know if you have any further questions or if there's anything else I can help you with.

answer.final_answer:
Based on your interest in watching critically acclaimed films with high IMDb ratings, I have compiled a list of award-winning movies that fit your criteria. Here are some examples:

1. The Shawshank Redemption (1994) - IMDb rating: 9.3 - Available on Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Google Play Movies, and iTunes. This movie won several awards including the WGA Award for Best Drama Series and the People's Choice Award for Favorite Motion Picture.
2. The Godfather (1972) - IMDb rating: 9.2 - Available on Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Disney Plus, Apple TV Plus, Google Play Movies, and iTunes. This classic film won three Academy Awards, including for Best Picture, Best Actor (Marlon Brando), and Best Writing, Story and Screenplay – Based on Material From Another Medium.

Based on the information I've obtained from the API, there are several popular romantic comedy movies currently available on streaming platforms in the US. I recommend checking out "To All the Boys I've Loved Before" and "Always Be My Maybe," both of which are available on Netflix. These movies have received great reviews and have gained a large following due to their charming storylines and relatable characters. The runtime and IMDb ratings for these movies are currently unavailable in the given response.

Another popular romantic comedy currently streaming in the US is "Set It Up" on Netflix. This movie follows two overworked assistants who team up to make their bosses fall in love, leading to some hilarious and romantic situations. The runtime for "Set It Up" is 1 hour and 59 minutes, and its IMDb rating is 7.3.

Hulu offers the romantic comedy "Crazy, Stupid, Love," which features an all-star cast and a heartwarming story about love, relationships, and second chances. The runtime for "Crazy, Stupid, Love" is 1 hour and 58 minutes, and its IMDb rating is 7.4.

Amazon Prime Video has the romantic comedy "Long Shot," starring Charlize Theron and Seth Rogen. This movie has been praised for its refreshing take on the romantic comedy genre. The runtime for "Long Shot" is 2 hours, and its IMDb rating is 7.4.

I hope this information helps you find some great movies to watch with your partner! Let me know if you have any other questions.

answer.final_answer:
Based on your interest in historical films and your request for acclaimed movies available for streaming in the US, I've compiled a list of five historically acclaimed movies along with their runtimes and IMDb ratings.

1. "Schindler's List" (1993) - Directed by Steven Spielberg, this movie has a runtime of 175 minutes (2 hours and 55 minutes) and an IMDb rating of 8.9. It tells the story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who saved the lives of more than a thousand Jewish refugees during the Holocaust. This movie is available for streaming on Hulu and Showtime.

2. "Ben-Hur" (1959) - This epic historical drama, with a runtime of 212 minutes (3 hours and 52 minutes), has an IMDb rating of N/A for the streaming version but the original movie has an IMDb rating of 8.0. It follows the story of Judah Ben-Hur, a Jewish prince who seeks revenge against his Roman adversary, Messala, after being wrongly imprisoned and separated from his family. This movie can be rented or bought for streaming on Amazon Prime Video.

3. "Gladiator" (2000) - Set in the late Roman Republic, this movie has a runtime of 155 minutes (2 hours and 35 minutes) and an IMDb rating of 8.5. It follows the story of Maximus Decimus Meridius, a general who is betrayed and enslaved after his family is murdered. He rises through the ranks of gladiatorial combat to avenge his family's death and restore the Roman Republic. This movie is available for streaming on Starz and Hulu.

4. "Braveheart" (1995) - This historical drama, with a runtime of 177 minutes (2 hours and 57 minutes), has an IMDb rating of 8.5. It tells the story of William Wallace, a Scottish warrior who leads an uprising against English rule in the late 13th century. This movie can be rented or bought for streaming on Amazon Prime Video and iTunes.

5. "The King's Speech" (2010) - Based on a true story, this movie has a runtime of 118 minutes (1 hour and 58 minutes) and an IMDb rating of 8.0. It follows King George VI of the United Kingdom as he struggles to find a way to communicate effectively with his people after his brother's abdication. He enlists the help of an unorthodox speech therapist to overcome his stutter. This movie is available for streaming on Netflix and Hulu.

I hope this information helps answer your question and provides you with a good selection of historically acclaimed movies available for streaming in the US. If you have any further questions or need additional details, please let me know.

  "final_answer": " Based on your interest in historical films and your request for acclaimed movies available for streaming in the US, I've compiled a list of five historically acclaimed movies along with their runtimes and IMDb ratings.

1. "Schindler's List" (1993) - Directed by Steven Spielberg, this movie has a runtime of 175 minutes (2 hours and 55 minutes) and an IMDb rating of 8.9. It tells the story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who saved the lives of more than a thousand Jewish refugees during the Holocaust. This movie is available for streaming on Hulu and Showtime.

2. "Ben-Hur" (1959) - This epic historical drama, with a runtime of 212 minutes (3 hours and 52 minutes), has an IMDb rating of N/A for the streaming version but the original movie has an IMDb rating of 8.0. It follows the story of Judah Ben-Hur, a Jewish prince who seeks revenge against his Roman adversary, Messala, after being wrongly imprisoned and separated from his family. This movie can be rented or bought for streaming on Amazon Prime Video.

3. "Gladiator" (2000) - Set in the late Roman Republic, this movie has a runtime of 155 minutes (2 hours and 35 minutes) and an IMDb rating of 8.5. It follows the story of Maximus Decimus Meridius, a general who is betrayed and enslaved after his family is murdered. He rises through the ranks of gladiatorial combat to avenge his family's death and restore the Roman Republic. This movie is available for streaming on Starz and Hulu.

4. "Braveheart" (1995) - This historical drama, with a runtime of 177 minutes (2 hours and 57 minutes), has an IMDb rating of 8.5. It tells the story of William Wallace, a Scottish warrior who leads an uprising against English rule in the late 13th century. This movie can be rented or bought for streaming on Amazon Prime Video and iTunes.

5. "The King's Speech" (2010) - Based on a true story, this movie has a runtime of 118 minutes (1 hour and 58 minutes) and an IMDb rating of 8.0. It follows King George VI of the United Kingdom as he struggles to find a way to communicate effectively with his people after his brother's abdication. He enlists the help of an unorthodox speech therapist to overcome his stutter. This movie is available for streaming on Netflix and Hulu.

I hope this information helps answer your question and provides you with a good selection of historically acclaimed movies available for streaming in the US. If you have any further questions or need additional details, please let me know."
}

Based on my search, I have found several motivational movies with positive messages that you might find inspiring for your company's team-building event. Here are the titles and their streaming availability in the US:

1. The Pursuit of Happyness (2006) - Available on Netflix and Peacock. This movie is based on the true story of Chris Gardner, who went from being homeless to a successful stockbroker. It's a powerful reminder that no matter how difficult life gets, there's always hope and the potential for a better future.
2. Rocky (1976) - Available on Tubi, Pluto TV, and Amazon Prime Video with a subscription. The story of a small-time boxer who gets a rare chance to fight against the heavyweight champion. Despite the odds, he trains hard and manages to make it to the ring, making for an excellent underdog story.
3. The Shawshank Redemption (1994) - Available on Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime Video. A story about hope and redemption, set in a prison. The main character forms a strong bond with a fellow prisoner and together they pursue a dream of a better life.
4. Dead Poets Society (1989) - Available on Hulu, Netflix, and Amazon Prime Video. A teacher inspires his students to "seize the day" and embrace life with passion. The movie explores themes of self-discovery and the importance of following your dreams.
5. The Princess Diaries (2001) - Available on Disney+ and Hulu. A young girl discovers that she is a princess and must navigate the challenges of royal life. The movie is filled with positive messages about self-acceptance and the importance of being true to yourself.

I hope you find these suggestions helpful and that you enjoy the movies! Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with.

answer.final_answer:
Based on the movie database API, I have identified and provided you with five horror movies in English language that might be of interest to you and your family. These movies are: The Conjuring (2013), The Exorcist (1973), Get Out (2017), Hereditary (2018), and The Ring (2002). For each movie, I have also included information on where you can stream it in the US and Canada.

1. The Conjuring (2013): In the US, this movie is available for streaming on HBO Max, Starz, and Showtime. In Canada, it can be streamed on Crave and Starz.
2. The Exorcist (1973): In the US, this classic horror film can be streamed on Shudder, Tubi, and Peacock. In Canada, it's available on Crave and Tubi.
3. Get Out (2017): In the US, this contemporary horror film can be streamed on Netflix, Hulu, and Shudder. In Canada, it can be streamed on Netflix, Crave, and Tubi.

To share a long URL with your colleagues and create a new link using a shortened URL and a custom domain, follow these steps:

1. Use a URL shortening tool like Bitly to generate a shortened URL for the long URL:
   a. Go to the Bitly website (www.bitly.com) in your web browser.
   b. Sign in to your Bitly account, or create a new one if you don't have one.
   c. Paste the long URL into the "Long URL" field on the homepage.
   d. Click the "Shorten" button to generate a shortened URL.
   e. Copy the shortened URL and use it as needed.

2. Identify a suitable domain for your company using a domain registration or management tool:
   a. Choose a domain registration or management service, such as GoDaddy or Namecheap.
   b. Sign up for an account with your preferred service provider.
   c. Use the domain name search tool provided by the service to check the availability of your desired domain name.
   d. Choose a domain extension that best fits your needs and brand.
   e. Register the domain and manage it through the domain registration or management tool.

3. Create a new link with the identified domain and the shortened URL using a link creation tool:
   a. Go to a link creation tool such as Bitly or your preferred URL shortening service.
   b. Paste the long URL you want to shorten in the input field provided by the tool.
   c. Click on the "Shorten URL" or "Generate Link" button to create the shortened URL.
   d. Copy the shortened URL.
   e. Go to your website or content management system where you want to create the new link.
   f. Paste the shortened URL into the link field.
   g. If necessary, paste the identified domain in front of the shortened URL to ensure the link displays the full domain name.
   h. Save or publish the new link as desired.

Remember to ensure that the link creation tool and the platform where you create the new link allow the use of shortened URLs and custom domains.

answer.final_answer:
To share a blog post with your followers on social media and generate a shortened URL using the Bitly API, follow these steps:

1. Obtain an access token from your Bitly account by creating a new token in the "API" tab.
2. Use the access token in your API request to generate a shortened URL for your blog post:

```python
import requests

# Replace YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN with your actual access token
access_token = "YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"
long_url = "https://example.com/blog-post"

headers = {
    "Authorization": f"Bearer {access_token}"
}

response = requests.post("https://api-ssl.bitly.com/v4/shorten", data={"long_url": long_url}, headers=headers)

if response.status_code == 200:
    short_url = response.json()["result"]["short_link"]
    print("Shortened URL:", short_url)
else:
    print("Error:", response.json()["message"])
```

3. Choose an appropriate domain for the shortened URL based on the following factors:
   - Brand recognition
   - Memorability and simplicity
   - Domain availability
   - Cost
   - Security
   - Target audience.

For example, consider using a domain that aligns with your brand name, is short, simple, and easy to remember, and is available and easy to register. Additionally, invest in a secure domain extension and consider the needs and preferences of your target audience.

answer.final_answer:
To plan a vacation with your family and share the itinerary using a shortened URL and a travel-themed domain name, follow these steps:

1. Obtain an API key for Bitly by signing up for an account on their website if you don't already have one. You can find your API key in the "Settings" section of your account dashboard.
2. Choose a travel-themed domain name using a domain registration API or service. Here are some suggestions: TravelSite.com, WanderlustVibes.com, JetSetLife.net, AdventureAwaits.org, or VacationHQ.net. Keep in mind that availability of these domain names may change, so it's best to check the registration API or service directly for the most up-to-date information.
3. Generate a shortened URL for your itinerary using the Bitly API. Make an HTTP request to the API endpoint with your API key included in the request headers, and include the long URL of your itinerary in the request body. Here's an example of how to make such a request using cURL:

```bash
curl -X POST \
  'https://api-ssl.bitly.com/v4/shorten' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{"long_url": "https://example.com/your-long-url"}' | jq -r '.bitly.short_url'
```

Replace `YOUR_API_KEY` with your actual API key, and replace `https://example.com/your-long-url` with the long URL of your itinerary. The response from the API will include the shortened URL, which you can extract from the JSON response using a tool like `jq`. This command will output the shortened URL as a string, which you can then use with your travel-themed domain name.

For example, if you register the domain name WanderlustVibes.com, you can create a subdomain like itinerary.wanderlustvibes.com, and use the shortened URL as the content of that subdomain. This way, when you share the URL itinerary.wanderlustvibes.com with your family, they will be taken directly to the shortened version of your itinerary.

To share a news article with your colleagues, you have two main tasks: identifying an appropriate domain for sharing news articles within your company industry and generating a shortened URL for the article using the Bitly API.

First, let me provide some suggestions for an appropriate domain for sharing news articles within your company industry based on a domain search tool. Here are some options:

1. industrynews.com: This domain name clearly indicates that it is intended for industry-specific news and information. It could be an excellent choice for sharing news articles related to your company industry.
2. companynewsnetwork.com: This domain name suggests a network dedicated to sharing news and information about various companies within an industry. It could be an ideal choice if your company belongs to a larger industry and you'd like to foster a sense of community and collaboration.
3. newsforindustry.com: This domain name suggests a platform dedicated to providing news and information specifically for various industries. It could be an excellent choice if you're looking for a reputable and established platform to share news articles with your team.

These are just a few of the many domain suggestions provided by the API response. I recommend considering the specific needs and goals of your company when choosing a domain for sharing news articles within your industry. Additionally, it's essential to ensure that the domain you choose is available and that you have the necessary resources to set it up and manage it effectively.

Second, to generate a shortened URL for the given news article using the Bitly API, follow these steps:

1. Obtain the full URL of the news article.
2. Go to the Bitly website or use their API to shorten the URL.
3. Paste the full URL of the news article into the Bitly interface or API request.
4. Bitly will automatically generate a shortened URL for you.
5. Copy the shortened URL and use it to share the news article with your team or audience.

Remember, when using a URL shortening service like Bitly, ensure that the service is reputable and secure to maintain the privacy and integrity of the links you share. Additionally, some organizations may have policies against using URL shortening services due to security concerns, so be sure to check with your team or IT department before using one.

The "Entertainment" category on YouTube includes comedy content.

To explore specific comedy videos or channels within this category for download or streaming options, you can use video streaming platforms or video downloaders. Streaming platforms like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Hulu, and YouTube Premium offer a vast collection of comedy shows, movies, and specials, with both ad-supported and ad-free viewing options.

If you prefer to download videos for offline viewing, you can use video downloaders like 4K Video Downloader, Freemake Video Downloader, or Any Video Converter. To use a video downloader, follow these general steps:

4. Start the download process.

Remember that downloading videos from copyrighted sources may violate the content owner's rights, and it's essential to respect intellectual property. Instead, consider supporting the creators by subscribing to their channels or purchasing their content through legal means.

Based on the information I have, here are some popular movies released in the last year and their streaming availability on Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, and Hulu:

1. Black Widow (2021): This action-packed Marvel film is currently available for streaming on Netflix and for purchase on Amazon Prime Video. It is not available for streaming on Hulu at the moment.
2. Shang-Chi and The Legend of The Ten Rings (2021): This martial arts superhero origin story is not currently available for streaming on any of the mentioned platforms. It is streaming on Disney+.
3. No Time to Die (2021): The latest James Bond film is not currently available for streaming on any of the mentioned platforms. It can be rented or bought on other streaming platforms or purchased digitally.
4. Venom: Let There Be Carnage (2021): This Marvel film is not currently available for streaming on any of the mentioned platforms. It can be rented or bought on other streaming platforms or purchased digitally.
5. Dune (2021): This visually stunning and epic adaptation of Frank Herbert's classic science fiction novel is currently available for streaming on Netflix. It is not available for streaming on Amazon Prime Video or Hulu at the moment.

I hope this information helps you plan your movie night with your friends. Let me know if you have any other questions.

I'd be happy to help you plan a family movie night! Here are some family-friendly movies that are currently available to stream on Disney+: "Coco," "Inside Out," "The Incredibles," "Moana," and "The Lion King." "The Princess Bride" is not currently available on Disney+ but may be available through other streaming services or for purchase or rental on platforms like Amazon Prime Video or iTunes.

For snacks, popcorn is a classic movie night option, and it's often low in calories if popped without added oils or salt. Other popular choices include chips and dips, such as guacamole, salsa, or hummus; pretzels; cookies; candy; vegetables and dip; or fruit skewers.

Enjoy your family movie night! Let me know if you have any other questions or need further assistance.

I'm glad to help you plan a romantic date night for you and your partner! Based on your request, I've found several romantic movies that are currently available for streaming on Netflix. Here are some titles you might be interested in:

1. The Irishman - This epic crime drama tells the story of Frank Sheeran, a truck driver who becomes an associate of the Bufalino crime family. With a star-studded cast including Robert De Niro, Al Pacino, and Joe Pesci, this movie is sure to be an engaging and romantic choice.
2. The Half of It - This romantic comedy follows Ellie Chu, a shy, introverted high school student who is hired by popular jock Paul Munsky to write love letters to the girls he likes. This heartwarming movie is a great choice for a romantic night in.
3. To All the Boys I've Loved Before - This romantic comedy tells the story of Lara Jean Covey, who writes secret love letters to all of her past crushes, only to have them all suddenly kissed by the recipients. This movie features charming and relatable characters, making it a must-watch for a romantic date night.
4. The Princess Switch: Switched Again - This romantic comedy follows dueling princesses Margaret and Stacy, who, after accidentally switching places, decide to help each other in their respective relationships. With its fairytale setting and heartwarming storyline, this movie is sure to provide a romantic and magical experience.
5. Holidate - This romantic comedy follows two strangers, Sloane and Jackson, who make a pact to be each other's plus-ones at every holiday event they attend that year. This movie is a great choice for a romantic date night during the holiday season.

Unfortunately, I was unable to find any romantic movies currently available for streaming on Prime Video due to an API error. I recommend checking their website or app directly for the most accurate and up-to-date information on their streaming offerings.

As for dinner ideas, I'd be happy to help you draw inspiration from the movies I previously mentioned. Here are some suggestions based on the scenes in the movies:

1. The Irishman - You could make some classic Italian dishes, such as lasagna, spaghetti Bolognese, or chicken parmigiana, to create a romantic dinner reminiscent of the scene in "The Irishman" where Frank Sheeran takes a date out for a nice meal at a fancy Italian restaurant.
2. The Half of It - In the movie, Ellie Chu cooks a heartfelt meal for her crush. You could try making a simple yet heartfelt meal, like grilled cheese sandwiches or a pasta dish with tomato sauce and fresh basil.
3. To All the Boys I've Loved Before - The movie includes scenes where the characters share meals together, such as dumplings and noodles. You could try making some Chinese or Asian-inspired dishes, like dumplings, stir-fry, or sushi.
4. The Princess Switch: Switched Again - In the movie, the characters enjoy a fancy dinner at a palace. You could try making a more elaborate and elegant meal, like coq au vin, beef Wellington, or a seafood paella, to create a romantic and sophisticated dining experience.

I hope these suggestions inspire you to create a romantic dinner for you and your significant other. If you'd like more specific recipe ideas, I'd be happy to help you search for those. Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help with.

Sure, I can help you with your road trip playlist and snack suggestions. To find popular songs on Spotify and Apple Music, we recommend checking the top charts on each platform. For Spotify, you can visit the "Billboard Top 100" or "Viral 50" playlists, and for Apple Music, you can check the "Pop Essentials" or "Breaking Pop" playlists. These playlists typically feature the latest and greatest hits across various genres.

To check the streaming availability of songs on Spotify and Apple Music, you can use the API endpoints provided by each platform. For Spotify, you can use the "search" endpoint to search for songs by artist, album, or track name, and for Apple Music, you can use the "nowPlaying" endpoint to search for songs by artist, album, or track name. Make sure to include the access token in the request headers to authenticate your API requests.

As for snacks, we suggest checking out popular themes such as American, Asian, and European cuisine. For American-themed snacks, you could try classic options like chips and dip, burgers, and hot dogs. For Asian-themed snacks, you could try dishes like sushi, spring rolls, and dumplings. For European-themed snacks, you could try options like cheese and crackers, baked goods, and olives.

It's important to note that the availability and popularity of these snacks can vary depending on factors such as location, personal preferences, and dietary restrictions. Therefore, we recommend checking the specific availability and popularity of each snack before consuming them. Additionally, be sure to pack enough snacks and drinks for your entire road trip, and remember to drive safely and responsibly.

answer.final_answer:
Based on the API response, it seems that the recommended podcasts for hiking are "Hike & Talk" and "The Hiking Podcast". These podcasts can be found on Spotify and Apple Podcasts. "Hike & Talk" is hosted by two hikers who share their experiences and stories from their hikes, covering topics such as gear reviews, trail etiquette, and safety tips. "The Hiking Podcast" is hosted by two experienced hikers who discuss various aspects of hiking, including gear reviews, trail maintenance, and conservation issues.

As for healthy snacks for hiking, some options to consider include fresh fruits such as apples, bananas, and oranges, which are great sources of energy and can be easily carried in a backpack. Nuts and seeds such as almonds, peanuts, and chia seeds are high in protein and healthy fats, making them a great snack to keep you full and energized during your hike. Trail mix made with mixed nuts, seeds, dried fruits, and dark chocolate can provide a delicious and nutritious snack option. Energy bars made with whole grains, nuts, and dried fruits are another great option for a quick and convenient snack. Yogurt and granola bars are also good choices, as they provide protein and carbohydrates to help fuel your hike. Remember to always pack enough snacks for your hike and to vary your diet to ensure that you are getting all the necessary nutrients for optimal health.
